abstract: Bristol-Myers Squibb said on Tuesday it had agreed to acquire ZymoGenetics, the maker of a hepatitis C drug the companies were jointly developing, for $885 million.
snippet: Bristol-Myers Squibb said on Tuesday it had agreed to acquire ZymoGenetics, the maker of a hepatitis C drug the companies were jointly developing, for $885 million.
lead_paragraph: Bristol-Myers Squibb said on Tuesday it had agreed to acquire ZymoGenetics, the maker of a hepatitis C drug the companies were jointly developing, for $885 million, Bloomberg News reported.
